item.title: 1D Transient Heat Conduction FDM
item.description: This project simulates the 1D transient heat conduction in a rod using the explicit Finite Difference Method (FDM). The code is implemented in Python and visualizes the temperature distribution over space and time using three different plots- a 2D line plot, a heatmap, and a 3D surface plot. The user can choose an initial condition for the temperature distribution, and the boundary conditions are fixed at zero for both ends of the rod.

item.title: 1D Poisson Equation Solver using Finite Element Method (FEM)
item.description: This project contains a Python implementation of the Finite Element Method (FEM) to solve the 1D Poisson equation

item.title: scikit-learn
item.description: scikit-learn is a Python module for machine learning built on top of SciPy and is distributed under the 3-Clause BSD license.
